projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: My Work
projects.intro: These projects reflect my growth in software development and data-driven thinking. Each one was a hands-on opportunity to deepen my skills, explore new technologies, and build practical solutions – from web apps to machine learning workflows. You'll find a brief description for every project, along with links to the code repositories.

histoapp.name: HistoApp
histoapp.description: A fullstack React & Spring Boot application for viewing and annotating DICOM-based tissue images, integrated with Orthanc PACS and Keycloak.

anamnese.name: Anamnesis Form – Automated PDF Analysis
anamnese.description: Automated analysis and processing of anamnesis forms, including PDF content extraction and checkbox evaluation.

region.name: Region Growing Labeling
region.description: Region growing segmentation of star-like structures using Python, NumPy, and scikit-image.

emotion.name: Emotion Recognition with Vision Transformer
emotion.description: Fine-tuned a Vision Transformer (ViT) model for emotion classification using the FER2013 dataset — including preprocessing, augmentation, and training.

parkinson.name: Parkinson Dataset Analysis
parkinson.description: Preprocessed and visualized 5,875 voice recordings from Parkinson's patients to identify predictors of UPDRS scores.
